about: I'm an OutSystems Developer and Full Stack Developer from Alenquer, Portugal, specializing in web development and system integration. I excel at transforming complex requirements into streamlined, efficient, and user-friendly applications.

My job is to develop robust and scalable web applications that are not only functional and efficient but also intuitive and visually appealing. I add a personal touch to each project, ensuring it stands out and is easy to use. My goal is to convey your message and identity most effectively and creatively as possible.
I have developed solutions for various companies, leveraging a range of technologies to meet their unique needs.
